simulator.payloads

Class NetworkScheduler.Connection.RepeatedPayload

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.NetworkScheduler.Connection.RepeatedPayload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeSensitive
    Enclosing class:
    NetworkScheduler.Connection

    protected class NetworkScheduler.Connection.RepeatedPayload
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimeSensitive
    A task that periodically enqueues a specified message for transmission.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkScheduler.Connection.RepeatedPayload(WriteablePayload message, SimTime period)
      Creates a new task that will enqueue the specified message once every period.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start()
      Enqueus the message for transmission, and will repeatedly enqueue after every period.

      Called when a Timer expires.
